testcase.name: Validating the Login functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome or any desier brower should be launched........................passed When Salesforce login page opend "https://login.salesforce.com/"............passed Then User should see the text box to enter login credentials "Login | Salesforce".passed When enter Username as "ramkrish@mastek.com" and Password as "".............passed Then clicks on Login button with expected status as "Missing Password"......passed Then User should see the Salesforce Home page on successful login status "Missing Password".passed

testcase.name: Validating the Login functionality - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome or any desier brower should be launched........................passed When Salesforce login page opend "https://login.salesforce.com/"............passed Then User should see the text box to enter login credentials "Login | Salesforce".passed When enter Username as "ramkrish@mastek.com" and Password as "Welcome@124567890".passed Then clicks on Login button with expected status as "Both Fail".............passed Then User should see the Salesforce Home page on successful login status "Both Fail".passed

testcase.name: Validating the Login functionality - Example #1.3
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome or any desier brower should be launched........................passed When Salesforce login page opend "https://login.salesforce.com/"............passed Then User should see the text box to enter login credentials "Login | Salesforce".passed When enter Username as "ramkrish@mastek.com" and Password as "Welcome@1234567890".passed Then clicks on Login button with expected status as "Pass"..................passed Then User should see the Salesforce Home page on successful login status "Pass".passed

testcase.classname: Validate Home page features in Salesforce
testcase.name: To verify that the user can able to navigate to the Leads object
testcase.system-out: Given user should be in salesforce home page................................passed When user clicks the applauncher............................................passed And user should enter leads object name in the applauncer search box........passed And clicks object name or press Enter key...................................passed Then system should navigate to the Lead records list view page..............passed

testcase.classname: Validate Lead conversion page features in Salesforce
testcase.name: Verify user can able to create new lead record
